articles.author: Eric Campbell, Matt Henry
articles.title: The Barcelona lifeguards defying Europe to rescue migrants on the open sea - ABC News
articles.description: Oscar Camps was a lifeguard on the calm beaches of Barcelona. Then in a single day he saved more lives than in an entire career.
articles.content:
As Europe tries to stop the boats, lifeguards from the calm beaches of Barcelona are stepping in to save lives on the open sea.
First there's only darkness as we pound across black water. Suddenly, … [+17530 chars]
